task.title: Configuring SMS lawful interception support
task.shortdesc: Use command liconf lic for LI configuration and liconf liParams to configure SMS lawful interception support.

stepxmp.codeblock: liconf lic create --licIndex 1 --licId 1 --licIp 172.16.49.45 --licSpec LIPv2 +-------------+--------------+ | config | value | +-------------+--------------+ | licIndex | 1 | | licId | 1 | | licIp | 172.16.49.45 | | licSpec | LIPv2 | | licUserId | | | licPassword | | | cmmUserId | | | cmmPassword | | | adminState | unlocked | | lieAct | false | +-------------+--------------+

step.cmd: Configure LIC (ASN.1 LI interface type only).

stepxmp.codeblock: liconf lic create --licIndex 1 --licId 1 --licIp 172.16.49.45 --licSpec asn1_v2000 +-------------+--------------+ | config | value | +-------------+--------------+ | licIndex | 1 | | licId | 1 | | licIp | 172.16.49.45 | | licSpec | asn1_v2000 | | licUserId | | | licPassword | | | cmmUserId | | | cmmPassword | | | adminState | unlocked | | lieAct | false | +-------------+--------------+

step.cmd: Configure LIB (ASN.1 LI interface type only).

stepxmp.codeblock: liconf lib create --libIndex 1 --licId 1 --libIp 172.16.49.87 --libPort 50001 --libSpec asn1_v2000 --adminState unlocked --linkAct true +------------+--------------+ | config | value | +------------+--------------+ | libIndex | 1 | | libIp | 172.16.49.87 | | libPort | 50001 | | libSpec | asn1_v2000 | | licId | 1 | | adminState | unlocked | | linkAct | true | +------------+--------------+

step.cmd: Check current configuration for SMS lawful interception support.

stepxmp.codeblock: liconf liParams list +----------------------+----------------+ | parameterName | parameterValue | +----------------------+----------------+ | liEnableDtFiltering | false | | mmeRejectAttachTauLi | false | | mmeRejectLiCause | 14 | | smsLiReport | none | | synchTimer | 20 | +----------------------+----------------+

step.cmd: Enable SMS lawful interception support when DF2 supports receiving SMS over NAS IRI events.

stepxmp.codeblock: liconf liParams modify --parameterName smsLiReport --parameterValue both +----------------+--------------+ | config | value | +----------------+--------------+ | parameterName | smsLiReport | | parameterValue | both | +----------------+--------------+

substep.cmd: Enable SMS lawful interception support when DF2 supports receiving SMS only over the SGd interface.

stepxmp.codeblock: liconf liParams modify --parameterName smsLiReport --parameterValue sgd +----------------+--------------+ | config | value | +----------------+--------------+ | parameterName | smsLiReport | | parameterValue | sgd | +----------------+--------------+

substep.cmd: Enable SMS lawful interception support when DF2 supports receiving SMS only over the SGs interface.

stepxmp.codeblock: liconf liParams modify --parameterName smsLiReport --parameterValue sgs +----------------+--------------+ | config | value | +----------------+--------------+ | parameterName | smsLiReport | | parameterValue | sgs | +----------------+--------------+

step.cmd: Activate LIE when SMS lawful interception support is enabled.

stepxmp.codeblock: liconf lic modify --lieAct true --licIndex 1 +-------------+--------------+ | config | value | +-------------+--------------+ | licIndex | 1 | | licId | 1 | | licIp | 172.16.49.45 | | licSpec | asn1_v2000 | | licUserId | | | licPassword | | | cmmUserId | | | cmmPassword | | | adminState | unlocked | | lieAct | true | +-------------+--------------+
